LightningComponentBundle.description: A modern hero banner component for record pages, app pages, and flows

property.name: height
property.label: Banner Height
property.description: Height of the hero banner (e.g., 400px, 50vh)

property.name: backgroundImage
property.label: Background Image
property.description: Name of the static resource containing the background image

property.name: logo
property.label: Logo
property.description: Name of the static resource containing the logo

property.name: headerText
property.label: Header Text
property.description: Main header text for the hero banner

property.name: subtitleText
property.label: Subtitle Text
property.description: Subtitle text for the hero banner

property.name: headerTextColor
property.label: Header Text Color
property.description: Color of the header text (e.g., #ffffff, red, rgb(255,255,255))

property.name: subtitleTextColor
property.label: Subtitle Text Color
property.description: Color of the subtitle text (e.g., #ffffff, red, rgb(255,255,255))

property.name: showBackgroundVideo
property.label: Show Background Video
property.description: Enable an MP4 background video for the banner

property.name: backgroundVideoUrl
property.label: Background Video (Static Resource Name)
property.description: Name of the static resource for the MP4 video

property.name: backgroundVideoFallbackUrl
property.label: Video Poster/Fallback Image (Static Resource Name)
property.description: Static resource name for the fallback poster image

property.name: backgroundVideoDarkness
property.label: Video Overlay Darkness (0-100)
property.description: Overlay darkness over the background video (0=no overlay, 100=black)
